home.listCV.ds: List of sample CVs for job applications
home.boxtext.title: CREATE CV ONLINE FOR FREE WITH JUST 3 STEP DESIGNED CV SAMPLES
home.boxtext.step1: Step 1: Search for a CV template that matches your criteria.
home.boxtext.step2: Step 2: Choose the free CV template that you like best and proceed to write your CV.
home.boxtext.step3: Step 3: After finishing writing your CV, proceed to save your CV and download it as PDF
home.boxtext.why: WHY SHOULD CREATE CV ON CV ONLINE
home.boxtext.detail1: Many beautiful, free CV templates, suitable for the needs of applying for different positions.
home.boxtext.detail2: Interactive intuitive, easy to edit information, create online CV quickly within 5 minutes.
home.boxtext.detail3: Get suggestions on how to write the right CV with detailed reference CV templates by industry.
home.boxtext.detail4: The CV template is synchronized with the cover letter templates.
